$comment: definition of the schema for the information required for NIA Case

payeeName.description: sting having a max of 100 alphabets. no numbers

payeeBank.description: sting having a max of 200 alphanumeric characters

payerName.description: sting having a max of 100 alphabets. no numbers

payerBank.description: sting having a max of 200 alphanumeric characters

payerBankIFSC.description: 11 character string. first for alphabets. fifth 0. last six mostly numeric, but alphanumeric allowed

cheque.description: uuid of the document for bounced cheque, stored in the document array in main case object

returnMemo.description: uuid of the document for cheque return memo, stored in the document array in main case object

comments.description: any additional comments. max of 400 alphanumeric characters

docProof.description: uuid of the document for liability proof, stored in the document array in main case object

comments.description: any additional comments. max of 400 alphanumeric characters

noticeDoc.description: uuid of the document for demand notice, stored in the document array in main case object

dispatchProofDoc.description: uuid of the document for proof of dispatch of demand notice, stored in the document array in main case object

serviceProofDoc.description: uuid of the document for proof of service of demand notice, stored in the document array in main case object

replyProofDoc.description: uuid of the document for proof of reply of demand notice, stored in the document array in main case object

isPaidAfterNotice.description: did the payer pay within 15 days after the notice or not

arrualDate.description: Date when the 15 days from service of demand notice was complete (date of accrual of cause of action). Auto filled based on 15 days from service date

reason.description: any additional comments. max of 400 alphanumeric characters

document.description: uuid of the document for delay condonation application, stored in the document array in main case object
